mapper.insert: insert into t_app_shop ( shop_id, goods_id , goods_count , is_deleted, gmt_create, create_by, gmt_modified, last_modified_by, version ) values ( now(), #{goodsCode}, #{goodsCount}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, now(), last_modified_by, 0 )
mapper.select: select shop_id shopCode, goods_id goodsCode, goods_name, goods_path, goods_count, goods_price, version from t_app_shop where is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: update t_app_shop set is_deleted = 1, gmt_modified = now() where shop_id = #{shopCode}
